sql-item.sql: select u.user_id,u.name,wxa.openid,r.company_id,mm.item_id, ocx1.user_name as consultant_name,ocx1.wx_code as consultant_wechat from b2b_user.uuc_user u inner join b2b_user.uuc_user_identity r on u.user_id=r.user_id inner join b2b_user_business.business_card_record bcr on u.user_id=bcr.user_id inner join b2b_user.uuc_user_login_log l on u.user_id=l.user_id inner join b2b_company.uuc_supplier_basic b on r.company_id=b.supplier_id inner join m_yct.m_wx2ycguser wxa on u.user_id=wxa.userid inner join m_yct.zq_user zqu on wxa.openid=zqu.openid inner join b2b_parameter.bizp_area ba1 on b.province_code=ba1.item_code inner join b2b_parameter.bizp_area ba2 on b.city_code=ba2.item_code inner join dotnet_operation.op_connect_wxinfo ocx1 on (FIND_IN_SET(ba1.item_name,ocx1.respon_areas) or FIND_IN_SET(ba2.item_name,ocx1.respon_areas)) AND ocx1.business_type=0 inner join ( select supplier_id ,sum(r_count) as r_count,sum(f_count) as f_count from ( select DISTINCT a.supplier_id,b.count as r_count,a.count as f_count, a.t from ( select a.supplier_id,count(DISTINCT a.item_id) as count,'r' as t From b2b_op_activity.op_fit_my_recruit a INNER JOIN b2b_bidding.bid_recruit_item i on a.item_id=i.item_id and i.case_num>0 LEFT JOIN ( select company_id,count(uid) as p_cnt from b2b_company.uuc_supplier_project where `status`=2 and is_del=0 and IfNULL(company_id,'')<>'' GROUP BY company_id ) p on a.supplier_id=p.company_id where a.is_complete_meet=0 and i.case_num>ifNull(p.p_cnt,0) group by a.supplier_id ) a left JOIN ( select supplier_id,count(DISTINCT item_id) as count,'r' t from b2b_bidding.bid_recruit_item_register GROUP BY supplier_id ) b on a.supplier_id=b.supplier_id ) a group by a.supplier_id HAVING((sum(r_count)/sum(f_count))<0.6) ) fit on b.supplier_id=fit.supplier_id inner JOIN ( SELECT supplier_id, item_id, Nom FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN @cn != supplier_id THEN @rownum:= 1 ELSE @rownum:= @rownum + 1 END AS Nom, @cn := supplier_id AS supplier_id, item_id FROM (SELECT @rownum:=0) r, (SELECT @cn:='') p, b2b_op_activity.op_fit_my_recruit ORDER BY supplier_id, item_id DESC ) subQuery WHERE Nom <=5 ) mm on mm.supplier_id = fit.supplier_id where u.user_biz_type=1 and u.`name` not like 'test%' AND b.company_name not like 'test%' AND l.login_type=2 AND l.login_time BETWEEN DATE_ADD(now(),INTERVAL -24 HOUR) and now() and zqu.appid=@appId GROUP BY u.user_id,mm.item_id

sql-item.sql: select DISTINCT supplier_id,`subject`,short_name,developer_type,item_id,t from ( select a.supplier_id,a.item_id,bcia.`subject`,if(ISNULL(c.short_name),c.company_name,c.short_name) as short_name,c.developer_type,'r' t From b2b_op_activity.op_fit_my_recruit a inner join b2b_company.uuc_supplier_basic usb on a.supplier_id=usb.supplier_id inner join b2b_bidding.bid_recruit_item bcia on a.item_id=bcia.item_id inner join b2b_company.uuc_developer c on bcia.company_id=c.developer_id left join b2b_bidding.bid_recruit_item_register brit on a.supplier_id=brit.supplier_id AND brit.item_id=a.item_id AND brit.supplier_id=@supplier_id where brit.item_id is null and a.supplier_id=@supplier_id and a.item_id=@item_id ) a where `subject` not like 'test_%' and short_name not like 'test_%' order by developer_type LIMIT 1
